front.title: Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering(RSVP-TE) Extensions for Inter-AS P2MP TE LSPs

abstract.t: [RFC4875] describes extensions to RSVP-TE protocol for building a P2MP TE LSP in MPLS/GMPLS network environment.However, [RFC4875] doesn't specify path selecting problem of inter-AS P2MP TE LSP.This document specifies an inter-AS P2MP path computation method based on extentions to RSVP-TE Protocol.
